applicant-name.name: SICHUAN JINXING CLEAN ENERGY EQUIPMENT GROUP CO LTD
四川金星清洁能源装备集团股份有限公司

invention-title: Waveform sealing structure suitable for hydrogen environment
一种适用于氢气环境的波形密封结构

abstract.p: The invention discloses a wave-shaped sealing structure suitable for a hydrogen environment, which comprises an upper sealing ring, a wave-shaped sealing ring and a lower sealing ring which are stacked from top to bottom for use, a convex ring A is arranged on the upper sealing ring, a wave-shaped convex ring is arranged on the wave-shaped sealing ring, and a convex ring B is arranged on the lower sealing ring. The metal sealing ring is used for solving the problem that hydrogen sealing performance is reduced due to microcracks generated by stress concentration, thermal expansion and other factors when an existing metal sealing ring works at high temperature and high pressure, the three sealing rings which are used in an overlapped mode and are detachable are adopted, the elastic protruding ring is introduced to each sealing ring so that certain deformation and buffering effects can be provided, and the sealing performance of hydrogen is improved. The stress concentration and fatigue influence are reduced, the generation probability of microcracks is reduced, the better sealing effect is achieved, and the service life of the sealing ring is prolonged.

本发明公开了一种适用于氢气环境的波形密封结构，包括由上至下叠加使用的上密封环、波形密封环和下密封环，上密封环上设有凸环A，波形密封环上设有波形凸环，下密封环上设有凸环B。本发明用于解决现有金属密封环在高温、高压下工作由于应力集中、热膨胀等因素产生微细裂纹而降低氢气密封性，采用叠加使用且可拆卸的三个密封环，并在每个密封环上引入具有弹性的凸环，以提供一定的变形和缓冲作用，减轻受到的应力集中和疲劳影响，降低微细裂纹的产生概率，达到更好的密封效果，并且延长其使用寿命。
